nodes.text: Wor Tandell was a location in the galaxy that traded with the Galactic Empire. During the Gorse conflict, while attempting to persuade Hera Syndulla to leave Gorse with him, Kanan Jarrus offered to take her there, saying it was nice. Imperial Captain Rae Sloane later imagined that Denetrius Vidian's cyborg staff on Calcoraan Depot, among other things, managed trading with Wor Tandell.
Wor Tandell was first mentioned in canon in the 2014 novel A New Dawn.
